import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var APIEndPoint='to be replaced with your api endpoint here';function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[APIEndPoint.startsWith('http')&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(APIResult,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,className:"App-MainLogo",alt:"logo"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContentLayout,{header:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SpaceBetween,{size:"m",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{variant:"h1",description:"A photo album web application that can be searched using natural language through both text and voice.",children:"Photo Album Search"})}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tabs,{tabs:[{label:"Upload Photos",id:"first",content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UploadPhotos,{})},{label:"Search Photos",id:"second",content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchPhotos,{})}],variant:"container"})})]});}var APIResult=function APIResult(){var _useFetch=useFetch(APIEndPoint,{headers:{accept:"application/json"}}),data=_useFetch.data,error=_useFetch.error;if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error.message});if(data)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:data.message});return null;};export default App;
